class EvaluacionesController {
         getByGrilla(Id grillaId) EvaluacionesGrilla $
         getByDivision(Id divisionIdId grillaId) EvaluacionesDivision $
         saveByDivision(String divisionIdString grillaIdList draftValues) void $

         saveByBoletin(String boletinIdList draftValues) void $

         getPrograma(Id divisionId) Programa $

}

| #  | Referencia       | #  | Referencia |
| -- | ---------------- | -- | ---------- |
| +  | public or global | #  | protected  |
| -  | private          | ~  | Package    |
